xmodel.name: EuraceUnibi - Financial Fragility Models
xmodel.description: Authors: Sander van der Hoog, Simon Gemkow, Philipp Harting.

variable.name: switch_on_warning_about_exparg
variable.description: Switch on warnings about large exp(args). These are if-statements, allowing the code to continue to run.

variable.name: switch_on_asserts_about_exparg
variable.description: Switch on asserts about large exp(args). These are assert-statements, halting the code.

variable.name: rnd_seed
variable.description: GSL Random Number Generator Seed, compatible with xparser-gsl.

variable.name: GSL_RNG_SEED
variable.description: GSL Random Number Generator Seed, compatible with xparser 0.17.1.

variable.name: total_regions
variable.description: Total number of regions.

variable.name: visual_log
variable.description: Switch for visual log

variable.name: stock_flow_log
variable.description: Switch for stock flow log

variable.name: id_debug_probe
variable.description: ID to probe for debuging

variable.name: print_debug_floors_and_ceilings
variable.description: Debugging floors and ceilings of: pd, lgd, firm and deposit interest rates.

variable.name: print_debug_files
variable.description: Output streams to separate files for each agent

variable.name: print_debug_files_banks
variable.description: Output streams to separate files for each Bank agent

variable.name: print_eurostat_info
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for printing eurostat info

variable.name: print_consumption_info
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for printing consumption market info

variable.name: print_bank_info
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for printing bank info

variable.name: print_credit_info
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for printing credit market info

variable.name: print_rental_info
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for printing rental market info

variable.name: print_housing_info
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for printing housing market info

variable.name: print_bank_mortgage_tables
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print bank mortgage tables.

variable.name: print_bank_mortgage_info
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print bank mortgage info.

variable.name: print_mortgage_info
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for printing household mortgage info

variable.name: print_macropru_info
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for printing macropru info

variable.name: print_debug_id_probe
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for debugging output for specific IDs probed

variable.name: time_debug_probe
variable.description: Time period for debuging: print if (DAY GT time_debug_probe)

variable.name: print_log
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for debugging output in general.

variable.name: print_debug_macropru
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for negative payment accounts of Households.

variable.name: print_debug_negative_payment_account
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for negative payment accounts of Households.

variable.name: print_debug_bankruptcy
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for bankruptcy functions.

variable.name: print_debug_eurostat
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for Eurostat.

variable.name: print_debug_ch
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for ClearingHouse.

variable.name: print_debug_afm
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for AFM (full order lists).

variable.name: print_debug_afm_ch
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for AFM, ClearingHouse info only.

variable.name: policy_exp1
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal.

variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal.

variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging output to terminal.

variable.name: print_debug_market_research
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging output to terminal.

variable.name: print_debug_credit_risk_mngt
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal. Used for Bank Credit Risk Management.

variable.name: print_debug_credit_unittest
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal. Used for detailed debugging info.

variable.name: print_debug_crm_risk_weight_lookup
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal. Used for detailed debugging info.

variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal.

variable.name: print_debug_housing_unittest
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal. Used for detailed debugging info.

variable.name: print_debug_rental

variable.name: print_debug_rental_unittest
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal. Used for detailed debugging info.

variable.name: print_debug_mortgage_hh
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal.

variable.name: print_debug_mortgage_hh_unittest
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal.

variable.name: print_debug_housing_branches
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal.

variable.name: policy_exp_energy_shock
variable.description: Switch for policy experiment: energy shock.

variable.name: policy_exp_stabilization_subsidy
variable.description: Switch for policy experiment: stabilization policy using subsidy scheme.

variable.name: policy_exp_stabilization_tax
variable.description: Switch for policy experiment: stabilization policy using tax reduction scheme.

variable.name: switch_policy_taylor_rule
variable.description: Switch for policy experiment: monetary policy using a Taylor rule.

variable.name: switch_regulatory_ltv_dsti_caps
variable.description: Switch for policy experiment: regulatory LTV and DSTI caps.

variable.name: const_bankruptcy_idle_period
variable.description: Number of iterations that a bankrupt firm remains idle, before resuming production activity.

variable.name: days_per_month
variable.description: Optional setting for the number of days in a month.

variable.name: xml_cloned
variable.description: Indicator variable: Value 1 if a cloned xml file is used

variable.name: transition_phase_innov
variable.description: Transition phase for technological innovations. Default: 0.

variable.name: transition_phase_recap
variable.description: Transition phase for recapitalization of firms and banks by Central Bank. Default: 3000.

variable.name: transition_phase_taylor_rule
variable.description: Transition phase for Taylor rule and funding costs. During this transient all interest rates are zero: Bank deposit interest rate, Bank dividend rate, CB funding costs (both interest rates on CB debt and on excess reserves). Default: 10.000.

variable.name: const_transition_phase_policy
variable.description: Transition phase for any policy. Default: 8000 (400 months).

variable.name: const_init_transient_period
variable.description: Initial transient period. Useful for letting economy function in a transient-mode during a transient period. Default: 6002.

variable.name: const_minimum_consumption_of_median
variable.description: Fraction of the median value of the distribution of consumption, used for determining the minimum consumption level.

variable.name: const_wealth_income_ratio_target
variable.description: Target wealth to income ratio. Used by households to determine their total (liquid+illiquid) savings. This is used to determine the consumption budget. But only relevant if TRADING_ACTIVITY=1.

variable.name: const_liquid_wealth_income_ratio_target
variable.description: Target liquid-wealth to income ratio. This is the buffer stock savings parameter used by households to determine their liquid wealth (payment account) as multiple of their freely disposable income. This parameter is used in the mortgage market for the precautionary savings motive to save for the own contribution for the mortgage loan, given by (1-LTV)*Loan.

variable.name: id
variable.description: Agent ID.

variable.name: indicator
variable.description: Indicator always 1, variable for counting no. of agents that satisfy certain conditions when filtering data.

variable.name: region_id
variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

variable.name: gov_id
variable.description: Government to which the agent is associated.

variable.name: day_of_month_to_act
variable.description: Activation day.

variable.name: last_day_of_month_to_act
variable.description: One day before the activation day.

variable.name: payment_account
variable.description: Current account value.

variable.name: payment_account_balance_sheet
variable.description: Payment account when calculating balance sheet.

variable.name: bank_id
variable.description: Bank ID at which the agent maintains its payment account.

variable.name: partition_id
variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

variable.name: init_transient_period
variable.description: Initial transient period (in agent memory).

variable.name: switch_real_estate_sector
variable.description: Agent-level switch to turn on/off the mortgage, housing and rental markets (0: real estate sector switched off; 1: switched on).

message.description: Sent by agents to inform their bank about the current payment account balance.
